column2: Deadline for posting projects to be considered in the OSPO's GSoC mentor organization application
Accepted Mentor Organizations announced by GSoC
Candidates contact and work with project mentors.
Mentors help candidates improving their proposals, proposals are submitted
Mentors evaluate and rank student proposals.
Rankings due from mentors, sent to OSRE Org Admins
Contributor proposal rankings completed by Org Admins.
